data.title: About Cirrus
data.meta_description: For over twenty years our team has delivered an aviation experience that is the pinnacle of innovation, quality and safety to our customers.
data.text:
Our History of Innovation

Twenty years ago, we re-imagined personal aviation with the SR Series. It redefined performance, style, comfort and safety. But we didn’t stop there. In 2016, we ushered in a new era in transportation with the Vision Jet – the world’s first single-engine Personal Jet™.

Each year, we raise the bar with continuous improvements like sophisticated avionics and luxurious interiors. And we continue to redefine safety through our unique flight training program, Cirrus Approach, along with a host of tools and services to help us deliver a world-class experience to our customers across the globe.

The Plane with the Parachute

As the world’s first whole airframe parachute system included as standard equipment, CAPS® has returned over 250+ people to their families.

Redefining Flight Training

In 2016, Dale Klapmeier accepted the Joseph T. Nall Safety Award by AOPA for improving safety standards across all facets of aviation through Cirrus Approach™.

The World’s First Personal Jet

We ushered in a new era in personal transportation with the FAA certification of the Vision Jet.

Aviation’s Most Prestigious Award

In 2018, the Vision Jet was awarded the 2017 Robert J. Collier Trophy by the National Aeronautic Association for developing the world’s first single-engine Personal Jet and implementing CAPS on the Vision Jet. Awarded in 2021, the Safe Return autoland system featured on the Vision Jet, was awarded the 2020 Robert J. Collier Trophy.

Landing with the Touch of a Button

Safe Return™ emergency autoland revolutionizes passenger safety and joins CAPS® in creating a total safety solution, exclusive to the Vision Jet.

Media & Press

Find our logos, press kits and latest announcements.

Get Started

Plant Tour

Duluth, MN

Our Duluth, MN facility offers plant tours every Wednesday at 1pm CT at our production buidling, reservations are required. Please contact the front desk to schedule your tour at +1.218.727.2737.

Reserve a Tour

Our Mission

We are a passionate team of aviation enthusiasts – from pilots and mechanics, to engineers and accountants. Our individual backgrounds are unique but we share a singular mission: To deliver an aviation experience that is the pinnacle of innovation, quality and safety to our customers.

Join Our Team

Our team is our greatest resource and we’re always looking for talented folks to join us as we continue to push the boundaries of personal aviation in the many years to come.

Careers
